name: Everything Deviled Eggs
author: lutzflcat
summary: Everything seasoning is trending all over the United States. Although it may have made its debut on bagels, it's such a flavorful, multi-purpose blend and tastes so good on just about "everything," including deviled eggs.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon everything bagel seasoning, or to taste
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with water
Bring to a boil, remove from heat, and let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Remove eggs from hot water, cool under cold running water, and peel
Slice eggs in half lengthwise and set the whites aside
Place yolks in a mini blender or food processor; pulse several times until finely chopped
Add yogurt, mustard, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, and sugar and blend until smooth
Transfer yolk mixture to pastry bag fitted with a large star tip and pipe filling into the egg whites (or stuff filling into egg whites with a spoon)
Sprinkle with everything bagel seasoning and garnish with sliced scallions
Chill in the refrigerator until ready serve
